subSections.title: Glyph origin
Etymology
subSections.text:
{{zh-ref|Coblin (1986)}} compares this to {{cog|bo|tr=nyams-pa|t=be stained, tarnished, spoiled}}; {{zh-ref|Pan (1987)}} also notes {{cog|tai-pro|*ɲuɔmᴬ}} as well as {{cog|vi|nhuộm}}, both meaning "to dye". 

{{zh-ref|Schuessler (2007)}} cites {{zh-ref|Downer (1986)}}'s opinion that form with {{zh-l|上}} tone is the verb, while form with {{zh-l|去}} tone is the noun meaning "kind of cloth" ({{w|Lǐjì}}).
